name: City Anti-terrorist Attack
description:
City Anti-terrorist Attack is amazing counter shooting game which will test the sniper shooting skills of shooter games lovers. This special counter terrorist game is different from other terrorist shooting games because battle is not between the police and terrorists but this time take action against terrorist as counter terrorist. You were a simple citizen and spending very peaceful life but unfortunately terrorist squad took you with them and teach you all the tricks that how to spend the terrorists life.
Game features:
-first person shooter action packed gameplay
-huge array of weapons and equipment to use
-advanced weapon upgrade system
-destructive kinds of weapons and ammunition
-exciting anti-terrorist missions
-complicated situation, hijacked buildings and cross firing
-exciting map with realistic fighting arena environment
